LanguageData.JRWAcrocanthosaurusReconstruct.label: Acrocanthosaurus
LanguageData.JRWAcrocanthosaurusReconstruct.descripti:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #038292-1950 [ACROCANTHOSAURUS ATOKENSIS] CODENAME: MIDAS >9
A large, dangerous theropod with golden skin. Its incredibly powerful bite can tear the flesh of a colonist apart like a hot knife through butter.
